greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of occurrences of k in all overpartitions of n.
comment: It appears that row n lists the first differences of row n of triangle A235797 together with 2 (as the final term of the row).
The equivalent sequence for partitions is A066633.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (first 50 rows)
formula: G.f. of column k: 2*(x^k/((1 - x^k)*(1 + x^k))) * Product_{j>0} (1 + x^j)/(1 - x^j). - _Andrew Howroyd_, Feb 19 2020
program: A(n)={my(p=prod(k=1, n, (1 + x^k)/(1 - x^k) + O(x*x^n))); Mat(vector(n, k, Col(2*(p + O(x*x^(n-k)))*x^k/((1 - x^k)*(1 + x^k)), -n)))}
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 18 2014
ext: Terms a(22) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Feb 19 2020
